title: How Nobel Prize winners have shaped our research (British Heart Foundation)
text: ( Source : British Heart Foundation ) 5 October 2015 The 2015 Nobel Prizes are announced this week. Every day Christie Norris from our Research Communications team will look at how the work of previous Nobel Prize winners has influenced our
